edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict, java.lang.Comparable<Course>

    public class Course
extends Activity
implements java.lang.Comparable<Course>
    Creates Course Objects for the WolfScheduler application. Each Course Object keeps track of its name, title, section, credit hours, instructor id, meeting days, start time, and end time.
    Author:
    Steven Mayo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Course(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String section, int credits, java.lang.String instructorId, java.lang.String meetingDays)
      Creates a Course with the given name, title, section, credits, instructorID, and meeting days for courses that are arranged.

        public void setMeetingDays(java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Sets the course meeting days.
        Overrides:
        setMeetingDays in class Activity
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - the meetingDays to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a meeting day outside of 'A', 'M', 'T', 'W', 'H', 'F' is specified as an argument. Additionally, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown if and only if 'A' is an argument and not the only meeting day specified as an argument.
